page.title: 15Sheep Dipping
page.content: A mobile sheep dip was used for the first time at Fieldlands this year. In previous years the sheep have been taken to other farms to be dipped, but with an increase in the size of the flock, it became worthwhile calling in the mobile dipping contractors. Sheep dipping is required by law twice a year as part of the Sheep Scab Eradication Scheme. It is a time- consuming exercise with each animal having to be immersed for 1 minute. The farmer, Mr Corp, was pleased with the method and pronounced it quick and efficient. The sheep are now well and truly free from scab, and so is the dog and probably all the helpers too.
